miic3.utils.datatype.Matrix¶

class miic3.utils.datatype.Matrix(data=array([], shape=(0, 0), dtype=float64), header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>, axis0=None, axis1=None)[source]¶

Two dimensional dependent data with axis and meta information

Parameters

  • data (np.array) – dependent data

  • header (Header) – meta information of the data

  • axis0 (Series or Sequence) – independent data of the first dimension

  • axis1 (Series or Sequence) – independent data of second dimension

__init__(data=array([], shape=(0, 0), dtype=float64), header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>, axis0=None, axis1=None)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
